line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 1/2 cups white sugar")
create_ing(ing1, "4 cups all-purpose flour")
create_ing(ing2, "1 teaspoon baking powder")
create_ing(ing3, "1/2 teaspoon baking soda")
create_ing(ing4, "1/2 teaspoon salt")
create_ing(ing5, "3/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg")
create_ing(ing6, "1 teaspoon vanilla extract")

line.originaltext: Combine the flour with the baking powder, baking soda, salt and nutmeg.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing7, "dry mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a clean 1 liter sized glass jar with a wide mouth layer the white sugar followed by the flour mixture.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "clean 1 liter sized glass jar with a wide mouth")

line.originaltext: In a clean 1 liter sized glass jar with a wide mouth layer the white sugar followed by the flour mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing7}, ing8, "dry layers", "layerlayer white sugar followed by flour mixture")

line.originaltext: Press firmly in place and seal.
line.annotation: do(ing8, t0, ing9, "sealed layers", "press firmly in place and seal")

line.originaltext: Attach a card with the following instructions: In a large bowl: beat 1 egg with 1 cup softened butter or margarine until light and fluffy.
line.annotation: do(ing9, t0, ing10, "jar with instructions", "attach a card with the following instructions: In a large bowl: beat 1 egg with 1 cup softened butter or margarine until light and fluffy ")

line.originaltext: At low speed of an electric mixer add 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla and contents of Jar.
line.annotation: do(ing10, t0, ing11, "jar with instructions", "add instruction: At low speed of an electric mixer add 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla and contents of Jar. ")
do(ing11, t0, ing12, "jar", "add instruction: mix until combined")
do(ing12, t0, ing13, "jar", "add instruction: using hands if necessary")
do(ing13, t0, ing14, "jar", "add instruction: remove dough from the refrigerator")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
line.annotation: do(ing14, t0, ing15, "jar", "add instruction: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). ")

line.originaltext: Roll chilled dough out on a lightly floured surface to 1/8 inch thick.
line.annotation: do(ing15, t0, ing16, "jar", "add instruction: Roll chilled dough out on a lightly floured surface to 1/8 inch thick. ")
do(ing16, t0, ing17, "jar", "add instruction: Cut dough into desired shapes. ")

line.originaltext: Place on an ungreased cookie sheet and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes.
line.annotation: do(ing17, t0, ing18, "jar", "add instruction: Place on an ungreased cookie sheet and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes. ")
